dict.acceptation: 创造性的，有创造力的；有创意的，创新的，创造的；

sent.orig: This paper gives an overview of the Verification, Validation and Accreditation (VV&A) in High Level Architecture(HLA).
sent.trans: 对基于高层体系结构(High Level Architecture,简称HLA)的仿真系统的校核、验证与确认(Verification, Validation and Accreditation,简称VV&A)问题进行了详细的介绍及分析。

sent.orig: The creative recognition ability to the experimental set can be enhanced by creative thinking instruction.
sent.trans: 创思写作教学可提升实验组学生的创造性认知能力。

sent.orig: But second center, you become extremely creative, extremely creative.
sent.trans: 但是第二个中心，你变得极度有创造力，极度有创造力。

sent.orig: Responsibilities: 1. Under Creative Dept. Director supervision, organize and plan team creative work. 2.
sent.trans: 职责：1．在创意总监的带领下完成线下广告的创意和设计工作。

sent.orig: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to specific category.
sent.trans: 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件归入特定类别。
